title: Convert to Standard Form
text: The second equation must be in standard form: $$-2x+y=-2$$
speech: The second equation must be in standard form:  minus 2 x plus y is equal to negative 2
pacedSpeech: The second equation must be in standard form:   minus 2 x plus y is equal to negative 2

title: Writing the Matrix
text: Each equation goes in one row of the matrix. We now have: $$mat({5, -3}, ({-2, 1})$$
speech: Each equation goes in one row of the matrix. We now have:  m a t of parentheses 5 comma negative 3, comma, parentheses, negative 2 comma 1,
pacedSpeech: Each equation goes in one row of the matrix. We now have:   m a t of  5 comma negative 3, comma, , negative 2 comma 1,
